name: Veterans Apprenticeship Program
description: Apprenticeship opportunities for Veterans in Washington state through the Department of Veterans Affairs.

name: Veterans Education & Training
description: Educational and training programs to support Veteran career development and skill advancement.

name: Veterans Employment Resources
description: Employment assistance and job placement services for Veterans in Washington state.

name: Veterans Housing Resources
description: Housing assistance and support programs for Veterans including rental assistance and home loans information.

name: Tax Exemptions & Benefits
description: Free or reduced rate passes and tax exemptions available to eligible Veterans.

name: LGBTQ+ Veterans Support
description: Specialized support and resources for LGBTQ+ Veterans in Washington state.

name: Veterans Records Management
description: Assistance with obtaining and managing military records for Veterans.

name: Reentry Program & Veteran Court
description: Reentry support and Veterans Court services for Veterans involved in the criminal justice system.

name: Veterans Estate Management Program
description: Estate planning and financial management assistance for Veterans.

name: Veterans In-State Service Shared Leave Program
description: Shared leave program for Veterans employed by the state of Washington.

name: Counselor Locator
description: Find mental health counselors and support services in your area.

name: PTSD & War Trauma Program
description: Specialized PTSD and war trauma treatment and support services for Veterans.

name: Suicide Prevention & Crisis Support
description: Suicide prevention services and crisis support including 988 Lifeline access.

name: Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) Services
description: Treatment and rehabilitation services for Veterans with traumatic brain injuries.

name: Veterans Conservation Corps Program
description: Conservation and environmental service opportunities for Veterans combining employment and wellness.

name: Veteran Farm at Orting
description: Agricultural employment and wellness program located in Orting, Washington.

name: Veterans Training Support Center (VTSC)
description: Training and support center providing career development and employment assistance for Veterans.

name: Service and Companion Animals Program
description: Support and resources for Veterans with service animals and companion animals.

name: Veteran Owned Business Search Portal
description: Search and support network for Veteran-owned businesses in Washington.

name: Veteran Business Linked Deposit Program
description: Loan and financing support program for Veteran entrepreneurs and small business owners.

name: Veterans Cemetery Services
description: Cemetery services and burial options for eligible Veterans and their families.

name: Veterans License Plates Program
description: Special license plates and vehicle benefits for eligible Veterans.

name: Veterans Claims Assistance
description: Professional assistance with filing and processing Veterans benefits claims.

name: Veterans Financial Assistance
description: Emergency and ongoing financial assistance programs for eligible Veterans.

name: Federal VA Benefits Information
description: Information and resources about federal VA benefits available to Veterans.

description: Long-term care facility for Veterans located in Orting, Washington.

description: Long-term care facility for Veterans located in Port Orchard, Washington.

description: Long-term care facility for Veterans located in Spokane, Washington.

description: Long-term care facility for Veterans located in Walla Walla, Washington.

name: Veterans Transitional Housing Program
description: Transitional housing assistance for Veterans transitioning to permanent housing.

name: Women Veterans Support
description: Dedicated resources and support programs for Women Veterans in Washington state.

name: Military Spouse Support Programs
description: Resources and support services for military spouses and families.

name: Washington Department of Veterans Affairs
description: Main office providing comprehensive Veterans benefits and services. Contact: 1-800-562-2308. Mailing address: 1102 Quince St. SE, PO Box 41150, Olympia, WA 98504-1150.
